name: Carrot Cake Overnight Oats

ingredients.name: Apple Pie Spice or Summer Berry Sweet Dip Mix

preparation: Measure oats into a Mason jar or container of your choice. Pour in milk; stir in carrots and dip mix.
Top with berries and enjoy in the morning!
tips: Double the recipe. Make and store in Rectangular Steamer.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 hard-cooked egg, or add 1 scoop of Power Up Vanilla Protein Blend in Step 1.

products.name: Apple Pie Spice
summary: Move over pumpkin spice; it's time for Apple Pie Spice to shine! Perfect for leveling up the taste of fall-inspired baking, it's also great on top of oatmeal, in a frothy late or smoothie â€“ or anywhere you want a punch of apple pie flavour.

products.name: Summer Berry Sweet Dip Mix
summary: If you could capture sweet summer in a jar, this would be it. A tangy, fruity blend of raspberries, strawberries, hibiscus, and a touch of rooibos, Summer Berry works as a dip or seasoning for yogurt, oatmeal, smoothies, and more.

products.name: Rectangular Steamer
summary: Easy to clean. Easy to serve. Rectangular, silicone steamer is perfect for side dishes & desserts.
